name: BaseBuild: Multi Album Video Library Plugin
author: Basebuild, Inc.

sections.installation: 1. Install your plugin as you would any other WordPress plugin and the settings will be accessible via the left side panel in the WordPress admin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install your plugin as you would any other WordPress plugin and the settings will be accessible via the left side panel in the WordPress admin.

Does this plugin work with newest WP version and also older versions?

Yes, this plugin works with WordPress 3.1 and above.

How can we contact you guys?

Feel free to email us at contact@basebuildguys.com or learn more at http://www.basebuildguys.com/blog/how-to-create-an-online-video-library-with-vimeo-not-youtube/
sections.description:
• Use Vimeo settings to control the look and feel.

  • Upgrade to display infinite albums.

  • Upgrade to add a search functionality.

  • Upgrade to feature recent videos at the top.

Feedback

  • We are always open for your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins!
  • Feel free to email us at contact@basebuildguys.com!
  • Learn more at http://www.basebuildguys.com/blog/how-to-create-an-online-video-library-with-vimeo-not-youtube/
